articles.description: The Giants are handed a heavy sanction after their general manager of football approached umpires during last Friday night's match against the Western Bulldogs.
articles.content: The AFL has fined Greater Western Sydney $20,000 in the wake of the club's general manager of football, Jason McCartney, approaching umpires during last Friday night's match against the Bulldogs in C… [+1456 chars]

articles.title: Dragons v Wests Tigers: Hunt back at half; Leilua pops up in centres - NRL.COM
articles.description: Dragons v  Wests Tigers: The Dragons have well and truly come back to earth after their heady four-game winning streak had them in the upper reaches of the eight and the talk of the town.
articles.content:
